doc.name: printDuplex

syntax.example: set the printDuplex to {"none" | "short edge" | "long edge"}

doc.summary: Reports whether the next print job should print double sided.

description.p: Use the printDuplex property to print double-sided. If "duplex" is not among the items of the printerFeatures then this property has no effect.
The printDuplex property is one of the following values.
- short edge: double-sided printing with tumble (flip the non-facing page)
- long edge: double-sided printing without tumble.
Attempting to set the printDuplex to an invalid value results in a script execution error.
To have an effect, this property must be set before calling open printing.
